body:
You want to know how the famous swing state will vote so you're interested in **Florida Polls**?

There's a better source.

You need betting data from Betfair. The global betting exchange uses **[The Wisdom of Crowds](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Wisdom_of_Crowds)** to create much more accurate predictions.

We can explain Betfair in a moment but let's get to what you want to see.

- - -

## **Donald Trump Florida Odds vs Joe Biden**

<canvas id='g13' name="brgraph" data-file-name="FloridaOdds.json" data-only-names="Republicans,Democrats" data-start="2018-01-01 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>

- - -

## **Florida Voting History**

The Presidential Voting in Florida is unbelievable. 

Their choice has gone on to win the Presidency in 11 of the last 12 Elections. That includes four Demographic choices.

**[270towin](https://www.270towin.com/states/florida)** do a great job of displaying Florida polls and Florida results.

![florida polls and results](/images/uploads/270win-florida-voting-history.png "florida polls and results")

As you can see, they are a fickle bunch. And with 29 Electoral votes you can see how Trump's Florida is key.

 That said, the Florida Keys are looking like blue in 2020.

The **[FiveThirtyEight Florida polls](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/florida/)** agree.

- - -

## **More US Election Odds**

We're determined to give you the most accurate prediction data in the world. Simply by reflecting betting data.

Make sure you check out:

* **[Election Betting Odds 2020: Trump vs Biden](https://www.betrefinery.com/us-election-betting/election-betting-odds)**
* **[Biden VP Odds](https://www.betrefinery.com/us-election-betting/biden-vp-odds)**

With many more exclusive pages to come.
